column2: "Great work! Let's see what kinds of decorations you've come up with!"
"Wow... This crystal glitters so beautifully, and it refracts the light into all these different colors!"

"It matches the lighting perfectly...
This is just what we need to make everyone feel like they're drifting through a sea of light!"
"Ooh, this is going to be so much fun! Thank you so much for doing all this for me! I seriously can't thank you enough!"
